title: 'Sweet Magnolias'
description:
'Sweet Magnolias,' the current no. 1 show on Netflix, seems to be crafted from a mix of the WB, Lifetime, and the streaming service's algorithm to create a perfectly pleasant and bingeable show.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
